website_summaries.verdict: While the new Surface Pro 3 is Microsoft's best PC to date, it's more successful as a tablet than a laptop replacement.
pros: The Surface Pro 3 is thinner and lighter than the previous two versions, despite having a larger 12-inch display and higher screen resolution
A new kickstand makes it easier to set up and use, and the keyboard cover remains a best-in-class example
The Surface Pro 3 is now optimized for a digital pen, which is included
cons: That excellent keyboard cover is not included in the base price, and its improved touchpad still doesn't measure up
The chassis lacks pen storage, and even with tweaked kickstand and keyboard hinges, the Surface Pro 3 still doesn't fit perfectly on the lap

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE PURCHASE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Battery failed after just four months but according to Microsoft it is out of warranty even though I bought it new in April. The only solution offered is to replace it for $450. I was so excited to get this product and now I wish I had never bought it. What is even worse is apparently this is a problem Microsoft is aware of but are there any solutions other than pay them to replace the entire unit - NO. But they continue to sell it even with the known battery problems. I would NOT RECOMMEND this product to anyone. To have to in essence pay for it twice in 6 months is outrageous. What a HUGE disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Deb McBride

customer_reviews.title: Errors after 5 days of buying
customer_reviews.text: After only 5 days I have a failure. Driver Power State Failure. I called Microsoft and they just had me reboot and check for updates which helped for about 30 minutes. I looked online and it said to update drivers. They all seem to be updated. It worked perfect for 5 days and now all of the sudden it reboots saying there is an error three times in 2 hours. Not sure what to do if it keeps doing this.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Leverett

customer_reviews.title: i love this thing
customer_reviews.text: i love this thing. bought it in june 2016, and am still using it as my sole windows device to this day. i still have a desktop, but it's only used as networked storage now. battery life is still decent, at 37,210 of factory 42k at over 900 charge cycles. i couldn't reccomend it enough, its extremely convenient to be able to carry a full windows pc as you would with a tablet. in combination with tethering/phone hotspot, i now have my full windows pc experience wherever i happen to need it. i broke the screen in december 2017
customer_reviews.author: Paul s.

customer_reviews.title: Best gift to myself
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! This is the best thing I've bought. I can monitor my assigments for school here. I dont have to carry notebook I can just use the pen and use the from writing to text option and later print if I need my notes to study for for an assignment. Since the windows 10 update it has been a little slow but I bet one they do a second update glitches would be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Ash Marie

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: Will not be getting a surface again... After owning this device for one year the internal wifi adapter died making me resort to a external wifi antenna... And the keyboard will not work anymore neither the one I ordered with it or the new one I got.. For the amount of money I spent it should have lasted much longer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.text: I have a work computer and have had a work computer since 2007. I just needed something light and simple to do my personal stuff on, this Surface is perfect. The tablet itself was exactly as described from the retailer. I would definitely order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Moore

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality. For a product by Microsoft themselves it runs into quite a few problems with the operating system that really shouldn't happen. Using it for notes in classes, much better than notebooks. Microsft Office works well with the product and is really a must for students, if not provided by your college.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Just pull the trigger, you wont regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic machine, replaced my aging laptop and my broken tablet. League of Legends (LOL) runs great at low res and medium low settings over 40-50 fps at all times. Hex Shards Of Fate Beta runs great at 720p 50-60 fps Xcom runs great at low/low 30-40 fps It really does everything they say and has become a staple in my man purse. Splurge and buy the type cover, yes its expensive but once you get your hands on it you will understand.
customer_reviews.author: News

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I use this every single day and it's by far the best laptop/tablet hybrid out there. I bought it refurbished for $500 and this thing is worth every penny. The pen is accurate, the boot time is quick, the processing power is good (Can actually run World of Warcraft on lowest settings) for an i3, and the system just works really well. My only complaint is the touchpad on the keyboard, but since that isn't part of this unit, I won't ding the actual machine.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Best Computer I've Owned
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I don't think I'll ever touch my iPad again. I feel it is only right for me to say that I'm not in the cult of Apple. If you are, you aren't even considering the purchase of a Surface anyhow, so I guess the audience is folks looking at HP and Lenovo products. I had a Lenovo prior to the Surface, it was nice, but for me the Surface really is a laptop replacement. It has all of the functionality of a laptop with the portability of a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Military Tester

customer_reviews.title: Used it like 3 times and was not very easy to work
customer_reviews.text: Used it like 3 times and was not very easy to work. Only got it to run a few programs for work, otherwise I use a Mac. It started having problems, so I let it sit on my desk forever. Next thing you know I needed it and it wouldn't work at all. Turns out no one locally can fix it. So sending into Microsoft was only option. Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing device.  What else could you ask for?
customer_reviews.text: -High resolution display -Excellent viewing angles and high color accuracy -Solid build -Can play classic steam games -Works with Windows software that was released since the beginning of time to fit your needs -The 3:2 aspect ratio makes it objectively the best way to read comics in portrait mode -Excellent at multi-tasking -Useful ports for many peripheral needs (mouse, keyboard, secondary display, thumb drive, etc.) Let me emphasize this one more time because it's an underrated shining feature of the Surface Pro 3. The aspect ratio of 3:2 makes it the best way possible to read comics digitally. A US comic single page size has an aspect ratio of approx. 1.53, and the SP3 comes closest at 1.50!
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: FAULTY BATTERY
customer_reviews.text: I gave one star for portability and battery because I received my device with no charge and without a functioning battery. I cannot use the surface without it being plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Cadet

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for work and home
customer_reviews.text: An excellent tool for the office. home and on the road. I like the fact that it operates the full version of Windows 8 and the Microsoft Office Suite. An exceptional value. If you use your computer to do primarily word documents, spreadsheets and internet browsing, it has the capability to replace your desktop or laptop computer with a very light and portable unit.
customer_reviews.author: GSA

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 for the grand kids, 1 will ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 for the grand kids, 1 will only work plugged in as the battery will not charge. Tried Microsoft help to no avail. The 5 star rating is for Amazon as they are going to give a refund for the battery broke one. I will then buy another one from Amazon Prime. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: isquare01

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Realtors!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Surface Pro 3 to help me be more productive as a Realtor. The I3 processor is just right for the multi-tab browsing and working with documents. While 64GB isn't exactly ideal, there are a variety of cloud storage options (Google drive to name one) that work just fine, or you could use an external hard drive. The pen comes in handy for e-sign applications, but it is a bit tricky to use without a steady hand. My recommendation is to forego the Microsoft connecting keyboard and use a Bluetooth keyboard and mouse when "desktopping" and the on screen keyboard when mobile.
customer_reviews.author: Luis C. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great value on this Surface Pro 3 with the price ...
customer_reviews.text: Great value on this Surface Pro 3 with the price I paid. While storage is a little limiting at 64GB, I do have option to upgrade storage using a micro SD card. So far, processor and graphics work well but I don't do any high-quality or high-resource work on it. Mostly just Office.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: We are really disappointed by this product
customer_reviews.text: We are really disappointed by this product. It has been in use for 14 monthes and has a suspected manufacturer defect. The options availabe to fix it time consuming and quite likely costly. This is not a product I would try again nor would I ever purchase it anywhere but from a store where I could get quicker and possibly more accurate answers.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Trapp

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !!
customer_reviews.text: Before I purchased the Pro 3, I made the mistake of thinking the surface was the same. It was not. I couldn't install any programs except for the applications. The Pro 3 is amazing!!! It does everything a laptop does and more. The touch screen with the pen is amazing. The 3.0 USB port is so helpful. The store is limited and most apps need to be purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Toledo

customer_reviews.title: dont update to windows 10
customer_reviews.text: Got the surface pro 3. Updated it to windows 10 a month ago and since then the sound doesnt work. contacted windows which failed to help and seems they have no idea how to solve the issue. Do not update to windows 10 if you dont have to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think this is the worst product Microsoft ever created
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the worst product Microsoft ever created. Its slow, when you do your first updates the screen locks up and you have to call Microsoft for assistance, I purchased 2 of these items and had the same problem with both. Shame...
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: This was a smart buy on my part
customer_reviews.text: This was a smart buy on my part. Items was shipped in quick time, two days before specified delivery date, I really liked that Lo ve the colour black and silver. the kickstand is great gives the surface pro flexibility and can put it in various position as desired The stylus pen is a lovely silver and purple colour, comes with one battery. I am 100% percent satisfied with the feel, looks, functionality and flexibility I recommend with absolute confidence

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Surface Pro 3. It does everything that a laptop does but I don't have to take it out of my carry on luggage when going through the airports.

And now I don't have to haul the laptop...because I broke the screen on it and it's working where it currently sits. So the laptop can stay home and the Surface Pro 3 can do the work on the road.

customer_reviews.title: Issues with actual Surface
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is with the actual Surface not with Amazon. Amazon did a great job of getting the Surface delivered on time, but several days after getting the Surface it would not turn on. I went on the internet and found out that this is a known common problem with the Surface. Luckily I was able to find the process to get the Surface to turn on, but when you spend $800 for a Surface it would be nice if Microsoft actually made sure they worked properly. Considering the Surface has been out for awhile and this is a known problem Micorsoft could of and should have fixed this issue.

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I like about this is the usb port to hook to ...
customer_reviews.text: You can tell it's new technology, bugs still need to be worked out. The only thing I like about this is the usb port to hook to a printer. But printing seems to be problematic too. Don't get this. Wait till they have pretty much worked out all bugs
customer_reviews.author: KittyLove

customer_reviews.title: Works like a laptop, looks great, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product has been so great. I would honestly highly recommend the Type Cover, though. It wouldn't be the same without it. As for the SP3 itself, I love it more than I ever thought I would. I was worried about it being too much like a tablet and not enough like a computer, but there hasn't been a single time that I've had anything come up that I couldn't do on here that I normally would on a laptop. The mini display port, the USB port, the memory card slot, all make this function exactly like any other laptop. It's powerful, easy to use, and very aesthetically pleasing. I get asked about it at school all of the time.

It would be nice if it came with the pen and keyboard but I found them for a decent price and I found a really nice cover to carry it in. I do wish I had sprung for the model that had the stronger processor but I didn't really think about using it for gaming until way later. It seems to run games like fallout: new vegas, skyrim, and protal fairly well if the games are tuned properly.

customer_reviews.title: Wireless stopped working at 34 days, no longer useful.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this since I'm currently traveling and all my other computers are desktops. On day 34 of me owning it, it won't pick up any wireless networks. I tried all the fixes online and even took it to a shop. The end result, "yep it's broke." It also only had a 30 day return, so now I'm stuck with it. Total waste of 700 bucks for me.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Larson

customer_reviews.title: Great for college
customer_reviews.text: I was unsatisfied with the price at first but now that i have it im in love. Im using this for college because i have to have so many huge textbooks that cost a lot and now i just use kindle for pc and i get all the ebooks and just doing that i probably saved about $500 in books. I love using onenote for note taking no more bulky binders that cost a lot. This is the best investment i have ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: WIN 10 for me
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting Win 8.1 as indicated in the product description. It came with Win 10 install, which is what I was planning on upgrading to. The packaging had signs of being used. There were not any visible defects on the device though.
customer_reviews.author: D. Leeds

customer_reviews.title: I should had bought at least de 128GB one For everything else this is a great product and can act like a botebook without proble
customer_reviews.text: 64GB of internal memory might not be enough for most of the people (i include myself). I should had bought at least de 128GB one For everything else this is a great product and can act like a botebook without problems In the near future i could upgrade it to the new pro 4 and at least with 128GB
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Avanzi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great and came in awesome condition. Needed something to do schoolwork on while traveling for work.
customer_reviews.author: B. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: The best I ever purchased in a tablet/computer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for work....AND OH MAN WHAT A GREAT TABLET/ COMPUTER this is...after a rough tumble with two Asus Google chrome net books , one Dell Google chrome.....all returned....this one was and is the winner.
customer_reviews.author: Lucian A. Sperta

customer_reviews.title: NOT NEW with MInor Scratch ok!
customer_reviews.text: Nice Pro 3 good service come quickly was advertised as NICE in box with minor scratch on back . . . scratch was minor no big deal was NOT new user name was set up for someone named MISSA and had a printer installed on it . . . . but works great for my work & online school
customer_reviews.author: MAGCasey

customer_reviews.title: i love the SP3 UX
customer_reviews.text: i love the SP3 UX. The app store is immature and the only thing that prevents me from giving it five stars. that said, it has a fully functioning browser that overcomes the app store gaps in most cases. it has me considering a windows phone at this point
customer_reviews.author: bajohnson1

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Seller
customer_reviews.text: It arived on time and everything works wonderfully. I was alittle upset that it didn't already have some kind of charge right out of the box. After a few system updates i was able to upgrade from Windows 8 to Windows 10, which is wonderful. I'm able to use my surface with the pen during classes to take notes, which reduces the amount of stuff that I have to carry in my backpack all day at school.
customer_reviews.author: Katie White

customer_reviews.title: She loves the ability to easily move it from the kitchen table to the couch
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife as her Christmas present. Over a month now and she still loves it! She loves the ability to easily move it from the kitchen table to the couch, and is impressed that MS Office runs on it. Probably the best gift I've ever gotten for her in terms of use and enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: W. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Worst mistake!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: At first,this was the best purchase I've made. I was very skeptical about purchasing this online. A little over a month later, my screen is not turning on.....with the money that I spent on this, I am beyond upset!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shonda

customer_reviews.title: Love Surface Pro devices
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an employee for work, works great for what we need to do on it such as write up service tickets and productivity applications while still being portable and tablet sized. Love the surface Pro line of devices.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Pridemore

product_meta.title: Microsoft Surface Pro 3 (4GB RAM 64 GB SSD, Intel Core i3, Windows 8.1)
product_meta.description:
SURFACE PRO 3
THE TABLET THAT CAN REPLACE YOUR LAPTOP.
Surface Pro 3 is in a category of its own. With a stunning 12" display in a sleek magnesium frame, Surface Pro 3 has all the power and performance of a laptop in an incredibly lightweight, versatile form. It may just be the ultimate device.*


THE POWER AND PERFORMANCE OF A LAPTOP
The razor-sharp clarity of the 12" Full HD Plus screen combined with a multi-position Kickstand, keyboard*, and multiple ports make Surface Pro 3 an exceptional device for getting work done. The 4th generation Intel Core processor gives you the power to run your favorite desktop software like Microsoft Office and Adobe Photoshop.†


THE BEST OF A TABLET
Weighing in at 1.76 lbs and only 9.1mm thin with up to 9 hours of battery life#, Surface Pro 3 is the perfect tablet for taking between classes, meetings, and on the road. The bright, responsive touchscreen, speakers with Dolby audio, and two 1080p cameras make video-conferencing or watching movies better than ever.


RUNS WINDOWS 8.1 PRO & OFFICE
With Windows 8.1 Pro, you can multitask by running up to three apps side by side. Purchase a 1-year subscription to Office 365 Personal and get Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, Outlook as well as 1TB of OneDrive online storage and 60 world minutes per month of Skype‡.


GREAT PEN EXPERIENCE
With a Pen that feels like an actual pen, this is the most natural writing experience on a tablet. With the click of the Pen, a blank sheet is available for writing and drawing, even if the device is asleep. Use the Pen to mark up presentations, sign documents, or enjoy art apps.






ACCESSORIES

SURFACE PRO 3 TYPE COVER
Work the way you’re used to working with the Type Cover designed for Surface Pro 3.


OFFICE 365
Get your favorite applications like Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook and OneNote and get work done virtually anytime, anywhere. Plus 1TB OneDrive online storage.


SURFACE PRO 3 DOCKING STATION
Transform your ultraportable Surface Pro 3 into a complete desktop workstation in an instant and easily connect to your favorite accessories.

†Keyboard, Office 365, and Photoshop sold separately

‡Skype account required. Excludes special, premium, and non-geographic numbers. Calls to mobiles are for select countries only. Skype world minutes available in select countries.

§Keyboard and pen sold separately

\\Surface 3: Testing consisted of full battery discharge during video playback. All settings were default except: Wi-Fi was associated with a network and Auto-Brightness disabled. Battery life varies significantly with settings, usage, and other factors.

#Surface Pro 3: Testing consisted of full battery discharge while Internet browsing over Wi-Fi. Internet browsing was tested browsing 25 popular webpages. All settings were default except: Wi-Fi was associated with a network, auto-brightness disabled, and Bluetooth Radio was turned off. Battery life varies with settings, usage, and other factors.

**System software uses significant storage space; your storage capacity will be less. See surface.com/storage. 1GB = 1 billion bytes.

††Available on Surface 3 with Windows 8.1 purchased prior to December 31, 2015. While supplies last.

***Office activation required within 6 months of Windows activation date.
